text: Mordechai Bibi (, 1 July 1922 - 5 February 2023) was an Israeli politician and lawyer. He was a member of the Knesset for Ahdut HaAvoda between 1959 and 1974. He was born in Baghdad, Iraq.Mordechai Bibi: Public Activities Knesset website ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Israeli politicians Category:Iraqi politicians
title: Mordechai Bibi
